trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> event or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> 控制項之 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> 事件或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> class is used to represent the method that handles the events in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler>類別用於表示處理下表中的事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control with another control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來同步處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>與頁面上的另一個控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 發生於功能表項目繫結至資料。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to modify a menu item before it is rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來修改功能表項目之前呈現在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler> delegate to programmatically register an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventHandler>要以程式設計方式註冊事件處理常式委派<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap.
trans-unit.target: 針對此範例正常運作，您必須為 Web.sitemap 檔案複製下面範例網站地圖資料。

trans-unit.source: The following is sample site map data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 以下是範例網站導覽資料先前的範例。
